JoinRequestDialog.title: Aw ka fara so kan .
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Nin ye so ye min bɛ kɛ mɔgɔ kelen ta ye, wa a bɛ wele bila mɔgɔ ma walasa a ka fara a kan .
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Nin so in bɛ ɲini ka don a la walasa a ka fara a kan. Butɔn digi min bɛ duguma walasa ka Join Request ci .
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Nin ye foroba so ye, aw bɛ se ka fara a kan ka ɲɛsin .
JoinRequestDialog.sendRequest: Aw ye Join ɲinini sɛbɛn ci .

MessageList.noMessages: Cikan ma sɔrɔ fɔlɔ, cikan fɔlɔ ci ka baro daminɛ!

error.loadFailed: A ma se ka cikan doni .
error.retry: Aw bɛ segin ka a lajɛ .

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Cikan ma sɔrɔ fɔlɔ, cikan fɔlɔ ci ka baro daminɛ!
